name: Middle Evil: The Priest
description:
Dark Middle-Ages. A young priest is coming in a small village where the local church became full of evil. Your need to help villagers and do seven night prayers which will defeat the evil.

It will be not easy. Skeletons, ghosts, vampires and other devils spawns will try to stop and kill you! But you have in your inventory all you need to take the victory: saint cross, sharp sword, censer with herbs and the holy book! Learn and compose the words to make the miracles! Any word - is your way to win! Villagers will help you to by selling different potions and items!



Death - is just beginning. If the evil will kill you - dont worry! The Underworld will glad to open the doors for your hero! Here you can upgrade the health or stamina and return to life to try win the creatures of the darkness!



Особенности игры:
  • 2d cartoon graphics and animation
  • dynamic gameplay
  • mirracles from words
  • middle ages atmosphere
  • cozy village and gloomy underworld
